snippet.title: Batman Rogue City Trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer for the upcoming doom total conversion Batman Rogue City. Based on the original two Wolfenstein mods from Team Raycast, the third episode of the trilogy continues in the doom engine where Batman must fight his many opponents once again who threaten to destroy the city. 

However, this is no ordinary team up. The villains have someone working from the outside to finance their mad schemes. Will the Batman be able to take down all the maniacs and killers who threaten the city or will he succumb to their great numbers?

Mod download: https://www.moddb.com/mods/batman-rogue-city/news/trailer-of-our-upcoming-batman-tc

Affiliate links: 
Batman the Complete Animated Series: https://amzn.to/3UWbXXC
Dark Knight Rises 4-Figure Mini Game HeroClix: https://amzn.to/3GkAEZp
Incredible Hulk HeroClix Booster Pack: https://amzn.to/3OfiES5
